title: Cremet pasta med asparges

instructions:
Put a saucepan over with water to the pasta. Cook it according to instructions on the package and pour the water off so that it is not cooked further.
Crack the ends of the green asparagus (the ends cannot be eaten). Cut them into approx. 1 cm long pieces.
Sweat onion and garlic in oil on a hot pan. Add the squash and asparagus and sweat it for a few more minutes, sprinkle with a KNSP salt and a little pepper.
Then get the water on the pan and crumble the broth cube on to dissolve faster. Pour the cream on with grated parmesan and turn it all around well.
Turn the fresh pasta into the mixture and finally mozzarella and fresh basil. Taste if the dish may be able to bruuse a little extra grinded pepper. Welcome!
